text: he loko! Apane raba tom daro jisa ne tuhanu ika jana tom paida kita hai ate use tom hi usa da jora paida kita hai. Unham dovam tom bahuta sare marada ate auratam phaila diti'am. Alaha tom daro. Jisa da vasata de ke tusim ika dusare tom saha'ita magade ho, suceta rahom risatedaram de sasadha vica. Besaka alaha tuhadi parakha kara riha hai
